title: why?!
body: So I was waiting for the queue to pop and it does so I accept and someone doesn't of course, after another 10 minutes of waiting I try to restart the queue  and right when I click the x the queue pops.  And my loading screen was frozen so I restart my client and I have a 5 minute wait saying I left or afk'd in a game. Is this normal? I've never left or been afk for more then a minute in a game.

replies.body:
It sounds like you may have rejected a queue or queue dodged recently, more likely the former. After waiting down the time, I don't expect you'll see this again.

Let me know if you see further queue timers.
